law.text: Each member of the board shall receive an amount not to exceed two hundred dollars ($200) for each day or part thereof spent in the performance of official duties, including time spent in necessary travel. In addition, each member of the board shall be reimbursed for all necessary and proper traveling and incidental expenses incurred in connection with these duties.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 12, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 19.
